title: Lupin the IIIrd: Chikemuri no Ishikawa Goemon
synopsis: Lupin's friend, the samurai Goemon Ishikawa, takes a job as bodyguard for a yakuza boss. But a brutal assassin kills the yakuza and Goemon is honor-bound to track him down.
related_anime: ['Lupin the IIIrd: Jigen Daisuke no Bohyou', 'Lupin the IIIrd: Mine Fujiko no Uso', 'Lupin III']
